scripts.docker:dev:all: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --profile tunnel --profile tools up
scripts.docker:down: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --profile tunnel --profile tools down
scripts.docker:infra: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres redis
scripts.docker:db:generate: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec web npm run db:generate
scripts.docker:db:push: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec web npm run db:push -- -- --accept-data-loss
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec web npm run db:migrate
scripts.docker:deploy: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec bot npm run deploy
scripts.docker:test: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec web npm run test
scripts.docker:test:integration: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec web npm run test:integration
scripts.docker:test:e2e: PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:4000 USE_EXISTING_SERVER=true npx playwright test apps/web/__tests__/e2e
scripts.docker:lint: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec web npm run lint
scripts.docker:test:smoke: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec bot npm run test:smoke
scripts.docker:test:smoke:bot: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec bot npm run test:smoke
scripts.docker:test:smoke:startgg: docker compose --env-file .env -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml exec bot npm run --workspace=@fightrise/startgg-client test:smoke
